mapper.select: select c.consumable_id as comsumableId, c.equipment_id as equipmentId, e.equipment_no as equipmentNo, e.equipment_name as equipmentName, dept.dept_name as equipmentDept, e.location as equipmentLocation, c.consumable_name as consumableName, c.consumable_no as consumableNo, c.activation_time as activationTime, c.due_time as dueTime, c.charge_user as chargeUser, u.user_name as chargeUserName, u.nick_name as chargeNickName, u.email as chargeUserEmail, u.phonenumber as chargeUserPhonenumber, c.status as status, c.remark as remark from equipment_consumables c join equipments e on c.equipment_id = e.equipment_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = c.charge_user left join sys_dept dept on e.department = dept.dept_id where u.del_flag = '0' and dept.del_flag = '0' and c.status = '0' and c.due_time <= #{date}
